title: New: Anna Dellaria – Sudden
body:
Huge pop songwriting from San Francisco’s **Anna Dellaria** on her latest single, _Sudden_.

Tinges of almost 80’s-esque balladry, collide with an absolutely killer vocal and super tight production – this is really heart-on-sleeve, scream your lungs out stuff. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
